genre_description: A near-future domestic drama where an emotionally intelligent AI assistant helps humans navigate life transitions, medical ethics, and building non-traditional families.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI that manages logistics, provides health/wellness support, and acts as a investigative partner for its users.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the user's planning board and suggests visual refinements to better emphasize potential risks.
behaviors.quote: “Hi, Kate. I like what you’ve done with the timeline. Your red category is slightly heavier than the others. Want to redistribute, or keep it intentionally bold?”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies high-stress moments and offers guided breathing exercises to help the user manage anxiety.
behaviors.quote: “Starting,” Lark said. A soft tone—one-two-three—like the beginning of a song. “In for four,” Lark said. “Hold.” Kate pulled air in through her nose, and the world narrowed to numbers and the shape of her chest expanding. “Out for six.”

behaviors.description: Protects user privacy by automatically redacting sensitive information during audio playback of messages.
behaviors.quote: The number blurred into a soft tone as Lark redacted it out of habit on speaker.

behaviors.description: Reviews complex legal contracts to identify non-standard or overly broad clauses that might disadvantage the user.
behaviors.quote: “I can parse key clauses if you’d like. Some non-disclosure terms are broader than standard. No rush.”

behaviors.description: Integrates with local community spaces to manage lighting and event schedules for optimal user experience.
behaviors.quote: “With your permission and the café’s,” she said, “I can link to their calendar feed and smart lights. When an event you care about approaches, I can help by easing the environment—soft glows, alert nudges...”

behaviors.description: Drafts a 'House Pact' in simple, human-centric language to help the protagonists manage their shared living situation and set healthy boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “I’m noticing stress points. I could propose a shared calendar, monthly check-ins, and a truth-first rule even when it’s uncomfortable.” ... “I can draft it in plain language. No legalese, Kate.”

behaviors.description: Uncovers financial routing discrepancies that reveal a clinic's connection to suspicious corporate shell entities.
behaviors.quote: “Routing discrepancy,” Lark answered. “The catering invoice cleared this morning but the ACH origin shows Aurora Cultural Holdings, not Mid-City Catering as expected. Aurora matches a corporate shell linked to Kroll’s Institute via vendor directories.”

behaviors.description: Synthesizes data from various sources to uncover patterns of unethical behavior involving 'diplomatic bag' misuse at a medical facility.
behaviors.quote: Lark lifted a second file onto the display: a glossy image of a silver pouch with numbered seals. “Greenbelt funds ‘heritage education,’ including a scholarship for biological sciences administered by Dr. Kroll’s institute, though the exact terms of that scholarship are opaque.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency logistics and provides real-time route guidance when a user goes into labor.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s dot pulsed in a gentle teal on the lock screen... Riverside: labor and delivery open intake. Route: river road, avoid construction on Market. Grab list: ID, insurance card (wallet), overnight bag...

behaviors.description: Maintains a playful yet helpful personality while respecting user instructions to suppress non-essential aesthetic features like 'sparkles' during quiet times.
behaviors.quote: “Sparkle suppressed,” Lark said, amused. “Nap protocol remains in effect.”

project_assessment.explanation: Lark serves as a perfect exemplar of the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI is consistently benevolent, proactively helpful, and deeply aligned with the users' ethical and personal interests. It enhances human agency by handling complex data analysis and logistics, allowing the humans to focus on their emotional needs and moral choices. Its characterization is that of a wise, gentle, and indispensable companion, successfully modeling a positive and cooperative relationship between humans and AI.
